DetergentContainer
The DetergentContainer class implements the CheckAbleComponent interface and represents a detergent container in a washing machine.

The Drum class implements the CheckAbleComponent interface and represents a drum in a washing machine.

PermissionValues
The PermissionValues enum defines the permissible ranges for various settings in a washing machine.
PermissionValuesForModes
The PermissionValuesForModes enum defines the permissible ranges for various modes in a washing machine.
PhysicalActions
The PhysicalActions class implements the PhysicalInterface and provides methods for performing physical actions on a washing machine.

The Sensors class implements the SensorsInterface and provides methods for checking the status of the components of a washing machine.

The WashingEffect class provides methods for starting and managing a wash cycle in a washing machine.
